name: CreateMessageInteraction
description: Create a new message Interaction to send directly from your system to one [Participant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/participant).  The `inbound` properties for the Interaction will always be empty.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the parent [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/service) resource.

SessionSid.description: The SID of the parent [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/session) resource.

Body.description: The message to send to the participant

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the MessageInteraction resource.
**data**: A JSON string that includes the message body sent to the participant. (e.g. `{"body": "hello"}`)
**date_created**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time in GMT when the resource was created.
**date_updated**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated.
**inbound_participant_sid**: Always empty for created Message Interactions.
**inbound_resource_sid**: Always empty for created Message Interactions.
**inbound_resource_status**
**inbound_resource_type**: Always empty for created Message Interactions.
**inbound_resource_url**: Always empty for created Message Interactions.
**outbound_participant_sid**: The SID of the outbound [Participant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/participant) resource.
**outbound_resource_sid**: The SID of the outbound [Message](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message-resource) resource.
**outbound_resource_status**
**outbound_resource_type**: The outbound resource type. This value is always `Message`.
**outbound_resource_url**: The URL of the Twilio message resource.
**participant_sid**: The SID of the [Participant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/participant) resource.
**service_sid**: The SID of the parent [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/service) resource.
**session_sid**: The SID of the parent [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/session) resource.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the MessageInteraction resource.
**type**
**url**: The absolute URL of the MessageInteraction resource.
